name: fabmanage-component-generator
description: Figma plugin for generating components from SVG with Atomic Design structure

scripts.dev: node scripts/build.js && echo 'Plugin built. Reload in Figma to see changes.'
scripts.dev-v2: node scripts/build-v2.js && echo 'Advanced plugin built. Reload in Figma to see changes.'
scripts.install: npm run build && echo 'Plugin ready! Install fabmanage-component-generator.zip in Figma.'
scripts.install-v2: npm run build-v2 && echo 'Advanced plugin ready! Install fabmanage-advanced-generator.zip in Figma.'

author: FabManage Team
